Problems Options Text Name Email SEND ABOUT US TravelBuddy, the world\'s largest travel platform, helps hundreds of persons to save the places they visited and makes life easier for them in just a few clicks. As a travel company available in 43 markets and 22 languages, TravelBuddy makes remembering places easy no matter how long in the past you\'ve been gone. OUR TEAM PRESIDENT & CEO \nTiurbe Serban is President and CEO of Travel Buddy. Serban has more than 5 years\' leadership experience across a diversity of sectors, including travel, digital media, e-commerce and data. CHIEF MARKETING OFFICER\nJohn Boris leads TravelBuddy\'s global marketing organization, inclusive of customer acquisition and engagement, performance and brand marketing. CHIEF LEGAL OFFICER\nSeth Kalvert has responsibility for all the legal activities of TravelBuddy. Prior to assuming his role as General Counsel in August 2011, Seth held various positions, most recently as Vice President. Please add the arriving date!
